Translations.Text: velekad bevve'na beni israile mubevvee sidkiv verazaknahum mine-ttayyibat. feme-htelefu hatta caehumu-l`ilm. inne rabbeke yakdi beynehum yevme-lkiyameti fima kanu fihi yahtelifun
fein kunte fi sekkim mimma enzelna ileyke fes'eli-llezine yakraune-lkitabe min kablik. lekad caeke-lhakku mir rabbike fela tekunenne mine-lmumterin
vela tekunenne mine-llezine kezzebu biayati-llahi fetekune mine-lhasirin
inne-llezine hakkat `aleyhim kelimetu rabbike la yu'minun
velev caethum kullu ayetin hatta yeravu-l`azabe-l'elim
felevla kanet karyetun amenet fenefe`aha imanuha illa kavme yunus. lemma amenu kesefna `anhum `azabe-lhizyi fi-lhayati-ddunya vemetta`nahum ila hin
velev sae rabbuke leamene men fi-l'ardi kulluhum cemi`a. efeente tukrihu-nnase hatta yekunu mu'minin
vema kane linefsin en tu'mine illa biizni-llah. veyec`alu-rricse `ale-llezine la ya`kilun
kuli-nzuru maza fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vema tugni-l'ayatu vennuzuru `an kavmil la yu'minun
fehel yentezirune illa misle eyyami-llezine halev min kablihim. kul fenteziru inni me`akum mine-lmuntezirin
summe nunecci rusulena vellezine amenu kezalik. hakkan `aleyna nunci-lmu'minin
